name: AR Simulator
description:
A offsides training tool that is kind of fun!

A player is offsides if they are behind the last defender and the ball when the ball is played to them (really second to last but we are imagining the goalie doesn't exist). You can make the call by clicking the flag slightly before or after the player receives the ball. Every correct call is 1 point. Every missed call or Incorrect call is -1 point. Good Luck!

AD or <- -> to move

click on flag to make call

Offside flag icons created by nawicon - Flaticon
